trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that change the position of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per gli eventi nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> controllo che modificano la posizione dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs class is used for the two annotation-positioning events, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs viene utilizzata per i due eventi di posizionamento dell'annotazione, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property gets the annotation object that is being positioned.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>proprietà ottiene l'oggetto annotazione da posizionare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also contains properties that retrieve the new location, width, height and anchor location of the annotation that is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe contiene inoltre proprietà che recuperano il nuovo percorso, la larghezza, altezza e posizione di ancoraggio di annotazione che viene riposizionato in riferimento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Annotation property allows the developer to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di annotazione consente allo sviluppatore di impostare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>proprietà durante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>gli eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new anchor location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova posizione di ancoraggio di annotazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that represents the new anchor position.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta la nuova posizione di ancoraggio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova posizione X punto di ancoraggio di annotazione.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationX property determines the new X coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>vengono generati eventi, la proprietà NewAnchorLocationX determina la nuova coordinata X dell'annotazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni sono utili quando l'annotazione viene ancorata appena a un punto dati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la nuova posizione X punto di ancoraggio di annotazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova posizione Y del punto di ancoraggio di annotazione.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationY property determines the new Y coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>vengono generati eventi, la proprietà NewAnchorLocationY determina la nuova coordinata Y dell'annotazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: Queste informazioni sono utili quando l'annotazione viene ancorata appena a un punto dati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value representing the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la nuova posizione Y del punto di ancoraggio di annotazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova posizione coordinate dell'annotazione X.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationX property defines the X-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>vengono generati eventi, la proprietà NewLocationX definisce la posizione della coordinata X dell'annotazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la nuova X coordinata percorso dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova coordinata Y della posizione dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationY property defines the Y-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>vengono generati eventi, la proprietà NewLocationY definisce la posizione della coordinata Y dell'annotazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la nuova coordinata Y della posizione dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new location and size of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova posizione e le dimensioni dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova altezza dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeHeight property to determine the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>vengono generati eventi, utilizzare la proprietà NewSizeHeight per determinare la nuova altezza dell'annotazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando si ridimensiona l'annotazione, è possono utilizzare queste informazioni.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la nuova altezza dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la nuova larghezza dell'annotazione.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeWidth property to determine the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>vengono generati eventi, utilizzare la proprietà NewSizeWidth per determinare la nuova larghezza dell'annotazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Quando si ridimensiona l'annotazione, è possono utilizzare queste informazioni.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la nuova larghezza dell'annotazione.
